languages.text: "Мой предшественник был еретиком, и лишь Император ведает, сколько богохульных мыслей он успел насадить в умах паствы. Я начну с нуля, как если бы прибыла на незнакомый с Кредо мир, и заново выстрою цитадель веры на этом судне. Через год вы будете окружены праведниками".

"My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."
languages.original_text: "Мой предшественник был еретиком, и лишь Император ведает, сколько богохульных мыслей он успел насадить в умах паствы. Я начну с нуля, как если бы прибыла на незнакомый с Кредо мир, и заново выстрою цитадель веры на этом судне. Через год вы будете окружены праведниками".

traits.locale_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he had managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I had arrived on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."

languages.text: "Mein Vorgänger war ein Ketzer, und nur der Imperator weiß, wie viele blasphemische Gedanken er im Geist seiner Gemeinde verankern konnte. Ich werde bei Null anfangen, als träfe ich soeben auf einer Welt ein, die den Glauben nicht kennt, und von dort werde ich die Zitadelle des Glaubens an Bord dieses Schiffs neu errichten. Binnen eines Jahres werdet Ihr von Rechtschaffenen umringt sein."
languages.original_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."

Ich werde bei Null anfangen, als träfe ich soeben auf einer Welt ein, die den Glauben nicht kennt, und von dort werde ich die Zitadelle des Glaubens an Bord dieses Schiffs neu errichten. Binnen eines Jahres werdet Ihr von Rechtschaffenen umringt sein."

languages.text: «Mi predecesor era un hereje, y solo el Emperador sabe cuántos pensamientos blasfemos logró inculcar a los miembros de su congregación. Yo partiré de cero, como si acabase de llegar a un mundo que no conoce el Credo, y desde ahí reconstruiré la ciudadela de la fe a bordo de este navío. Dentro de un año estará usted {mf|rodeado|rodeada} de devotos virtuosos».
languages.original_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."

traits.locale_text: «Mi predecesor era un hereje, y solo el Emperador sabe cuántos pensamientos blasfemos logró inculcar a los miembros de su congregación. Yo partiré de cero, como si acabase de llegar a un mundo que no conoce el Credo, y desde ahí reconstruiré la ciudadela de la fe a bordo de este navío. Dentro de un año estará usted {mf|rodeado|rodeada} de devotos virtuosos».

languages.text: 「私の前任者は異端者で、どれほど多くの神を冒涜する思想を信徒の心に植え付けたかは皇帝だけが知っています。スタートは何もないところからでした。信条に馴染みのない世界にたどり着いたようでしたよ。その状態から、この船で信仰という城塞を再建してみせます。1年以内に、正しい心の者達が囲う環境に変えて見せましょう」
languages.original_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."

traits.locale_text: 「私の前任者は異端者で、どれほど多くの神を冒涜する思想を信徒の心に植え付けたかは皇帝だけが知っています。スタートは何もないところからでした。信条に馴染みのない世界にたどり着いたようでしたよ。その状態から、この船で信仰という城塞を再建してみせます。1年以内に、正しい心の者達が囲う環境に変えて見せましょう」

languages.text: “我的前任神父是个异端分子，恐怕只有帝皇才知道他给教众灌输了多少亵渎神明的思想。我将会从头开始传播信仰，就像来到完全不了解帝皇信条的陌生世界一样。我将会在这艘船上重建信仰的堡垒，一年之内，您的身边必定会被义人围绕。”
languages.original_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."

traits.locale_text: “我的前任神父是个异端分子，恐怕只有帝皇才知道他给教众灌输了多少亵渎神明的思想。我将会从头开始传播信仰，就像来到完全不了解帝皇信条的陌生世界一样。我将会在这艘船上重建信仰的堡垒，一年之内，您的身边必定会被义人围绕。”

languages.text: « Mon prédécesseur était un hérétique, et l'Empereur seul sait combien de pensées blasphématoires il a réussi à semer dans l'esprit de ses ouailles. Je vais donc repartir de zéro, comme si je venais de débarquer sur un monde étranger au Credo, et rebâtir pierre par pierre la citadelle de la foi à bord de ce vaisseau. D'ici un an, vous serez {mf|entouré|entourée} de fidèles croyants. »
languages.original_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."

traits.locale_text: « Mon prédécesseur était un hérétique, et l'Empereur seul sait combien de pensées blasphématoires il a réussi à semer dans l'esprit de ses ouailles. Je vais donc repartir de zéro, comme si je venais de débarquer sur un monde étranger au Credo, et rebâtir pierre par pierre la citadelle de la foi à bord de ce vaisseau. D'ici un an, vous serez {mf|entouré|entourée} de fidèles croyants. »

languages.text: "Selefim bir kâfirdi ve kurultaycılarının zihnine ne kadar çok dine aykırı düşünce işlediğini yalnızca İmparator bilir. Ben, İtikat'i bilmeyen bir dünyaya gelmişim gibi sıfırdan başlayacağım ve geminin dört bir köşesine inanç hisarları inşa edeceğim. Bir yıl içinde iman sahipleri tarafından çevrelenmiş olacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "My predecessor was a heretic, and only the Emperor knows how many blasphemous thoughts he managed to instil in the minds of his congregation. I will start from nothing, as if I were arriving on a world unfamiliar with the Creed, and from there I will rebuild the citadel of faith aboard this vessel. Within one year, you will be surrounded by the righteous."
